snippet: A gathering held four years ago in California outlined tactics for taking on the fossil fuel industry, drawing lessons from the fight over tobacco.
abstract: Campaign to force Exxon Mobil to change position on climate change has its roots in 2012 gathering of activists in California, conceived by Harvard historian Naomi Oreskes; highlights from accompanying report, which documented strategy to take fossil fuel companies to court, noted.
lead_paragraph: A gathering held four years ago in California outlined tactics for taking on the fossil fuel industry, drawing lessons from the fight over tobacco.

headline.main: Public Campaign Against Exxon Has Roots in a 2012 Meeting
headline.print_headline: A Campaign Against Exxon Mobil Has Its Roots in a 2012 Gathering
